checks.description: Emergency department must be configured
checks.fixHint: Create an Emergency (ER) unit.

checks.description: At least one OPD unit must exist for registration
checks.fixHint: Create at least one OPD unit.

checks.description: At least one IPD ward must exist
checks.fixHint: Create at least one general ward unit.

checks.description: ICU must be configured
checks.fixHint: Create an ICU unit.

checks.description: ER must have at least one examination room
checks.fixHint: Add an examination/triage room to the ER unit.

checks.description: IPD beds must exist
checks.fixHint: Add beds to at least one ward unit.

checks.description: At least one OT suite must be configured
checks.fixHint: Configure an Operation Theatre unit.

checks.description: OT must have recovery area
checks.fixHint: Add a recovery room/bay to the OT unit.

checks.description: Procedure rooms must have consent-required services
checks.fixHint: Mark consent as required for procedure-type services.

checks.description: Pharmacy unit type must be enabled
checks.fixHint: Enable the Pharmacy unit type and create at least one pharmacy unit.

checks.description: At least one pharmacy unit must exist
checks.fixHint: Create a pharmacy unit.

checks.description: Drug formulary should have adequate coverage
checks.fixHint: Add drugs to the formulary for adequate coverage.

checks.description: Services requiring consent must be flagged
checks.fixHint: Review services and mark consent-required flag on procedures and imaging.

checks.description: At least one isolation room must exist
checks.fixHint: Create at least one isolation room in a ward or ICU.

checks.description: Negative pressure room for ICU
checks.fixHint: Add a negative pressure room in the ICU for airborne isolation.

checks.description: CSSD unit type should be enabled for sterilization
checks.fixHint: Enable the CSSD unit type and create a CSSD unit.

checks.description: Audit trail must be enabled (always on)
checks.fixHint: Audit trail is built into ZypoCare â€” no action needed.

checks.description: Each department should have a head assigned
checks.fixHint: Assign a department head to departments without one.

checks.description: At least one active staff member per department
checks.fixHint: Ensure every department has at least one active staff assignment.

checks.description: All buildings/floors must have fire zone assigned
checks.fixHint: Assign fire zone codes to all buildings and floors in Location setup.

checks.description: At least one emergency exit must be marked
checks.fixHint: Mark at least one location as an emergency exit.

checks.description: Radiology equipment must have valid AERB license
checks.fixHint: Upload a valid AERB license for all radiology/radiation equipment.

checks.description: Ultrasound equipment must have PCPNDT registration
checks.fixHint: Upload valid PCPNDT registration for all ultrasound machines.

checks.description: Equipment with AMC should have valid contract dates
checks.fixHint: Renew expired AMC contracts for equipment.

checks.description: Critical equipment must have preventive maintenance schedule
checks.fixHint: Set PM frequency and next PM date for critical equipment.

checks.description: All medical staff must have verified credentials
checks.fixHint: Verify registration credentials for all medical staff.

checks.description: No credentials expiring within 30 days
checks.fixHint: Renew credentials expiring within 30 days.

checks.description: Doctor-to-bed ratio must meet minimum (1:10)
checks.fixHint: Add more doctors or reduce active beds to meet the 1:10 ratio.

checks.description: Nurse-to-bed ratio must meet minimum (1:5 general)
checks.fixHint: Add more nurses to meet minimum nurse-to-bed ratio.

checks.description: USG operators must have PCPNDT authorization
checks.fixHint: Mark USG operators as PCPNDT-authorized in staff management.

checks.description: Service items should have standard code mappings
checks.fixHint: Map services to standard codes (LOINC/CPT/SNOMED) using the service library.

checks.description: Lab items must have reference ranges defined
checks.fixHint: Define reference ranges for lab diagnostic items.

checks.description: Service catalog must be published
checks.fixHint: Publish at least one service catalogue.

checks.description: Tax codes must be configured for billing
checks.fixHint: Configure at least one tax code (e.g., GST_EXEMPT for clinical services).

checks.description: At least one active tariff plan must exist
checks.fixHint: Create and activate a Price List tariff plan.
